situation: M was trying to follow a lesson using a text-to-speech tablet but the device malfunctioned, causing her to miss out on instructions and become confused.
action: The teacher aide promptly provided M with paper copies of the lesson material and used simple language and gestures to explain the key points directly.
effect: M was able to continue participating in the lesson without frustration, as the aide's intervention ensured she received the necessary information, demonstrating the importance of adaptability.
